title: Error opening League
body:
So, my client has been bugging out lately, whenever I go into a game queue, I am the only one that accepts, and the timer runs out. But instead of putting me back in the queue, it hangs on that screen and slowly everyone else connects. I thought that maybe there was a patch, so I quit and then tried to log back in. Click on the Launch button, then it hangs on a black screen for about 5 minutes and this error eventually pops up. http://gyazo.com/e358914211992d3db1a4586ecc99cd9b I have started a repair now, will edit when it finishes.

EDIT* Got to about 1600 files checked and then this popped up http://gyazo.com/4253884ca677dd0471fa234493fe35d8 Client still refuses to open.

EDIT2* Rebooted computer, tried to reopen client and it is still doing the original error. Tried opening with LoLPatcher.exe to no avail.

replies.body:
Hey,

That is a strange looking error - a remnant from an old version of the client perhaps.  Try checking out these two pages in the support site.  They might help with some ideas:

* [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)
* [Reinstalling League](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)

Let me know how it goes!
-Mindstar
I managed to get it working somehow. I ran another couple of repairs after I rebooted, and the last one decided to work, although it had to download over 2Gb in patches. Thanks for replying

So you basically redownloaded the entire game.

Well that works, I guess. Do you still have you item sets/settings?
